title: ‘Lanka not making decisions to make other countries happy’: People will decide what’s best for SL -Secy. External Affairs Min.
content: “Sri Lanka is not going to make decisions to make NGOs and other countries happy; what is best for our country and our people will be decided by the people of Sri Lanka” Secretary, Ministry of External Affairs, Karunathilaka Amunugama told Daily News. He said that President Mahinda Rajapaksa has made this clear on many…
